abstract: The Appraisal column; wealthy town of New Canaan, Conn, has become leader in affordable housing following efforts to comply with 1990 state law seeking to reverse decades of housing discrimination; has built number of affordable housing complexes, including 73-unit The Mill Apartments, in town's center.

headline.print_headline: Rich Connecticut Town Is a Grudging Model for Affordable Housing
headline.main: In Wealthy Pocket of Connecticut, an Innovative Approach to Affordable Housing

snippet: In compliance with a state law, New Canaan is trying to reverse decades of housing discrimination in one of the most economically stratified areas of the nation.
lead_paragraph: In compliance with a state law, New Canaan is trying to reverse decades of housing discrimination in one of the most economically stratified areas of the nation.
